document_data.name: Gond Sobor
document_data.mainbody: '''Gond Sobor''' was a temple dedicated to [[Gond]], the god of invention, located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The temple was located along the [[Golden Way]] in eastern Almorel. It sat near the outer city wall in the shadow of the [[Gospoda]] to the west.
